title: Initialize git repository (if missing)
description: Run `git init` (if .git is not present) and create the `main` branch.

title: Add .gitignore and ensure README.md
description: Create a recommended Expo/React Native `.gitignore` and confirm `README.md` exists.

title: Create GitHub repository (choose gh / web / API)
description: Create the remote repository via `gh`, GitHub web UI, or the REST API using a PAT.

title: Add remote and push initial commit
description: Add `origin` remote and push the local `main` branch with `git push -u origin main`.

title: Verify repository on GitHub and enable branch protections
description: Use `git remote -v`, `gh repo view`, or open the GitHub URL, then configure branch protection rules for `main`.
